message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $155 for the product.
I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $165, but that's as low as I can go.
